title: US Dollar Can’t Shake Risks
description: Currency traders recently unleashed a selloff that drove the dollar into its deepest slide since the US trade war began. Despite some ups and downs, the downward trend seems likely to continue. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Currency traders recently unleashed a selloff that drove the dollar into its deepest slide since the US trade war began. Despite some ups and downs, the downward trend seems likely to continue. (Source: Bloomberg)
